child moves to other side of table to see Robodog.
child bangs on table to get robodog to move again, and when it does, child returns to opposite side of table.
child leans across table to see Robodog, and then he peeks his head under table to talk to it.
mom knocks on table and robodog starts to move again.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom moves robodog out from under table.
child bangs on table and robodog starts moving towards him.
robodog stops moving, so child bangs on table again.
child moves chair out of robodog's way and then stands on it.
child moves robodog away from door and then talks to robodog.
child bangs on the table.
child moves robodog to other side of room.
child goes over to pet robodog and then gets startled and walks away.
child bangs on table again.
mom laughs.
child goes back over to robodog, talks to it and pets it once then runs back to his chair.
child bangs on table.
child goes over to robodog and picks it up to move it.
child goes over and pets robodog a few times.
child picks up robodog and moves it to the middle of the room.

mom and child speak simultaneously.
